mapper.select: SELECT m.router_name as name, m.component,m.path, m.hidden,m.i_frame,m.sort_no, m.pid, m.id, m.title as "meta.title", m.icon as "meta.icon",m.no_cache as "meta.noCache", m.affix as "meta.affix",m.bread_crumb as "meta.breadCrumb",m.active_menu as "meta.activeMenu" FROM user_role_relation r INNER JOIN system_role sr ON sr.id = r.role_id INNER JOIN role_menu_relation mr ON mr.role_id = sr.id INNER JOIN system_menu m ON m.id = mr.menu_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND sr.enabled = 1 AND m.enabled = 1 GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.sort_no

SELECT m.router_name as name, m.component,m.path, m.hidden,m.i_frame,m.sort_no,m.pid, m.id,m.enabled, m.title as "meta.title", m.icon as "meta.icon",m.no_cache as "meta.noCache", m.affix as "meta.affix",m.bread_crumb as "meta.breadCrumb",m.active_menu as "meta.activeMenu" from system_menu m where m.enabled = 1 ORDER BY m.sort_no

(SELECT id,pid,icon,sort_no,title as name, 0 as beButton,enabled from system_menu where enabled = 1) UNION ALL (SELECT id,menu_id as pid,icon,sort_no,button_name as name, 1 as beButton,enabled from system_button where enabled = 1) ORDER BY sort_no

SELECT DISTINCT m.permission from user_role_relation r INNER JOIN system_role sr ON sr.id = r.role_id INNER JOIN role_menu_relation mr on mr.role_id = sr.id INNER JOIN system_menu m ON m.id = mr.menu_id where r.user_id = #{userId} AND m.permission is not null AND m.permission != '' AND sr.enabled = 1 AND m.enabled = 1 group by m.id

SELECT m.id FROM system_user_role_relation r INNER JOIN system_role sr ON sr.id = r.role_id INNER JOIN system_role_menu_relation mr ON mr.role_id = sr.id INNER JOIN system_menu m ON m.id = mr.menu_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND sr.enabled = 1 AND m.enabled = 1 GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.sort_no
SELECT id from system_menu where enabled = 1 ORDER BY sort_no
